title: Field Interview Card
description: Generate an LSPD Field Interview (FI) Card.
output:
[font=Arial][center]LOS SANTOS POLICE DEPARTMENT
[size=120][color=black][b]FIELD INTERVIEW CARD (FRONT)[/b][/font][/color][/size][/center]

[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]NAME (FIRST, MIDDLE, LAST)[/size]
{{subject.name}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,13,5]
[size=87]PHONE[/size]
{{subject.phone}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]SEX (M/F/O)[/size]
{{subject.sex}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]HAIR[/size]
{{subject.hair}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]EYES[/size]
{{subject.eyes}}
[/tdwidth][/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,35,5]
[size=87]RESIDENCE[/size]
{{subject.residence}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]BIRTHDATE[/size]
{{subject.birthdate}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]DESCENT[/size]
{{subject.descent}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]HEIGHT[/size]
{{subject.height}}
[/tdwidth][/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]CLOTHING[/size]
{{subject.clothing}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]PERSONAL ODDITIES[/size]
{{subject.oddities}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]MONIKER / ALIAS[/size]
{{subject.moniker}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]GANG / CLUB[/size]
{{subject.gang}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=0,black,transparent,top,left,2,5]
[size=87][b]SUBJ
INFO[/b][/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,5,5]
[size=87] {{#if subj_info.loiterer}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}LOITERER
 {{#if subj_info.prowler}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}PROWLER[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,6,5]
[size=87] {{#if subj_info.homeless}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}HOMELESS
 {{#if subj_info.witness}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}WITNESS[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,7,5]
[size=87] {{#if subj_info.gang_activity}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}GANG ACTIVITY
 {{#if subj_info.has_record}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}HAS RECORD[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if subj_info.on_parole}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}ON PAROLE
 {{#if subj_info.on_probation}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}ON PROBATION[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=0,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if subj_info.driver}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}DRIVER
 {{#if subj_info.passenger}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}PASSENGER
[/size]
[/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]VEH. MAKE[/size]
{{vehicle.make}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]VEH. MODEL[/size]
{{vehicle.model}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]TYPE[/size]
{{vehicle.type}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]COLOR[/size]
{{vehicle.color}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]VEH. LIC. NO.[/size]
{{vehicle.plate}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=0,black,transparent,top,left,2,5]
[size=87][b]VEH
INFO[/b][/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if veh_info.bucket_seat}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}BUCKET SEAT
 {{#if veh_info.damaged_inside}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}DAMAGED INSIDE[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if veh_info.custom_wheels}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}CUSTOM WHEELS
 {{#if veh_info.painted_mural}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}PAINTED MURAL[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if veh_info.level_alter}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}LEVEL ALTER
 {{#if veh_info.rust_primer}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}RUST / PRIMER[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87] {{#if vehinfo.custom_paint}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}CUSTOM PAINT
 {{#if veh_info.vinyl_top}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}VINYL TOP[/size]

[/tdwidth]
[/tr]


[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=0,black,transparent,top,left,2,5]
[size=87][b]BODY[/b][/size]

[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,4,5]
[size=87] {{#if body_info.damage}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}DAMAGE
 {{#if body_info.modified}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}MODIFIED[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,3,5]
[size=87] {{#if body_info.sticker}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}STICKER
[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,3,5]
[size=87] {{#if body_info.left}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}LEFT
 {{#if body_info.right}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}RIGHT[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,3,5]
[size=87] {{#if body_info.front}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}FRONT
 {{#if body_info.rear}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}REAR[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=0,black,transparent,top,left,2,5]
[size=87][b]WINDOW[/b][/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,4,5]
[size=87] {{#if window_info.damage}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}DAMAGE
 {{#if window_info.tint}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}TINT[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,transparent,transparent,top,left,3,5]
[size=87] {{#if window_info.left}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}LEFT
 {{#if window_info.right}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}RIGHT[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,3,5]
[size=87] {{#if window_info.front}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}FRONT
 {{#if window_info.rear}}[cbc]{{else}}[cb]{{/if}}REAR[/size]
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]


[font=Arial][center]LOS SANTOS POLICE DEPARTMENT
[size=120][color=black][b]FIELD INTERVIEW CARD (BACK)[/b][/font][/color][/size][/center]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87][b]PERSONS WITH SUBJECT[/b][/size]
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
{{#each persons_with_subject}}
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]NAME (FIRST, MIDDLE, LAST)[/size]
{{this.name}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,13,5]
[size=87]D.O.B[/size]
{{this.dob}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]SEX (M/F/O)[/size]
{{this.sex}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,15,5]
[size=87]GANG / MONIKER[/size]
{{this.moniker}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
{{/each}}
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,30,5]
[size=87]ADDITIONAL INFO / NARRATIVE / INFORMATION[/size]
{{narrative}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]DATE[/size]
{{general.date}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]TIME[/size]
{{general.time}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,16,5]
[size=87]LOCATION[/size]
{{location.street}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,16,5]
[size=87]OFFICER[/size]
{{officers.0.name}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]SERIAL NO.[/size]
{{officers.0.badgeNumber}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,16,5]
[size=87]OFFICER[/size]
{{officers.1.name}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]SERIAL NO.[/size]
{{officers.1.badgeNumber}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Arial]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87][b]CALLSIGN[/b][/size]
{{general.callSign}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,16,5]
[size=87][b]INCIDENT NO.[/b][/size]
{{incident_no}}
[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]DIVISION[/size]
{{officers.0.divDetail}}
[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]DETAIL[/size]

[/tdwidth]

[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,8,5]
[size=87]SUPV. INIT..[/size]
{{supervisor_initials}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
